comment: If you like sweet things and you like whiskey, you will absolutely love this bottle. Not a "great whiskey" but a great glass straight up.
I tried this a few years back and liked it. Too sweet now. Overwhelming maple smell and not enough heat on the throat. Trying too hard.
Fuck you guys I like it.
Sweet flavor, less cloying than other maple whiskeys
Interesting flavor, finish is kind of weird.
